SEARCH

Package guru.mikelue.foxglove.jdbc

package guru.mikelue.foxglove.jdbc
This package provides the JDBC implementation of DataGenerator, TableFacet.
  • JdbcTableFacet is the main class to configure a table facet.
  • JdbcDataGenerator the working for insertion from JdbcTableFacets.

Examples

  • JdbcTableFacet.Builder - code snippets to configure table facets.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    guru.mikelue.foxglove
    Foxglove is a lightweight Java library for easing the generating data for testing database-related code.
  • Class
    Description
    ColumnSettingSteps
    Aggregation of steps for column setting steps.
    ColumnSettingSteps.CartesianProductSettingStep<T>
    The step to configure Cartesian product for a column.
    ColumnSettingSteps.ColumnFromStep<T>
    The step to configure column from another table.
    ColumnSettingSteps.ColumnSimpleStep<T>
    The step to configure column.
    ColumnSettingSteps.KeyOfIntSettingStep
    The step used to limit the number of rows by bounding integral value for a column,
    ColumnSettingSteps.ReferenceSettingStep<T>
    The step to configure reference column.
    ColumnSettingSteps.ReferenceSettingStep.CardinalityStep
    The step to configure cardinality of reference.
    JdbcDataGenerator
    JDBC implementation of DataGenerator.
    JdbcTableFacet
    JDBC implementation of TableFacet.
    JdbcTableFacet.Builder
    Builds a JdbcTableFacet with table name.
    RuntimeJdbcException
    Converts SQLException to unchecked exception.
